files.patch:
@@ -2042,1 +2042,0 @@

+
+      // on macOS according to setrlimit(2), OPEN_MAX must be used instead
@@ -2047,1 +2047,1 @@
-      // that the system claims can be used first.
+      // that the system claims can be used first, same as other BSD OSes.
@@ -2061,0 +2061,1 @@

-#endif
